document_data.name: Darzalstaukh
document_data.mainbody: '''Darzalstaukh''', which was also called the '''City of Dark Dreams''', was a powerful kingdom of [[duergar]] that existed beneath the [[Sunrise Mountains]] in [[Rashemen]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Though the duergar had yet to threaten Rashemen as of the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, the [[Rashemaar]] were nonetheless wary of the sinister gray dwarves. Given that [[drow]] were sometimes spotted in the [[Running Rocks]], the Rashemaar assumed the [[Underdark]] was contiguously connected beneath Rashemen, which would allow the duergar to strike wherever they wished. The [[hathran]]s hoped to broker some kind of trade deal with the duerger in order to obtain valuable [[iron]] ore and other metals.
